level.heading: Redesignation of Legal Aid Agency as Public Defender Service.
level.text: The Legal Aid Agency for the District of Columbia is redesignated the District of Columbia Public Defender Service (hereafter in this chapter referred to as the "Service").

level.heading: History
level.text: (July 29, 1970, 84 Stat. 654, Pub. L. 91-358, title III, ยง 301.)
